activities: We are a health information technology company that stores personal information for crew members and passengers traveling across the world.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client information regarding passengers and crew members. The data is manually entered by the customers users and secured/safeguarded by our organization.
privacyprograms: Our organization has certified products under the Office of the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology (ONC) of which we have an ONC-ACB certification in regards to safeguards, HIPAA compliance, clinical quality and security.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
